mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` (detailnum, email, name, phone, totalprice, sale, saleprice, usereserves, payprice, addreserves, address, pay, request) VALUES ((SELECT MAX(detailnum) FROM order_detail), #{email}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{totalprice} , #{sale}, #{saleprice}, #{usereserves}, #{payprice}, #{addreserves}, #{address}, #{pay}, #{request})
mapper.update: UPDATE `order` SET result = #{result}, delivery = #{delivery} WHERE email = #{email} AND detailnum = #{detailnum}
UPDATE `order` SET address = #{address}, request = #{request} WHERE email = #{email} AND detailnum = #{detailnum}
UPDATE member SET reserves = (addreservesfunction(#{email}, #{detailnum})) WHERE email = #{email}
UPDATE member SET reserves = (subreservesfunction(#{email}, #{detailnum})) WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `order` WHERE email = #{email} AND detailnum = #{detailnum}
